definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The pranas are always moving, and the mind is ever-changing as well.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸总是运动的，思想也总是千变万化。

sentences.english: At sunset the sky became a kaleidoscope of colors.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下时，天空的颜色千变万化。

sentences.english: The search lights and the fireworks made the sky a kaleidoscope of colour.
sentences.chinese: 探照灯和焰火使得天空的颜色千变万化。

sentences.english: Therefore, the ever-changing environment is very useful.
sentences.chinese: 所以环境的千变万化是非常有用的。

sentences.english: I mean, I mean she is ever-changing.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，她是千变万化的。

sentences.english: Sri Lanka is a protean and wonderful paradise.
sentences.chinese: 斯里兰卡是一个千变万化和精彩万分的人间天堂。
朋友之义，难在义字千变万化。

sentences.english: Today the richness of beadwork varies with fashion.
sentences.chinese: 现今珠饰品工艺随着时尚潮流而千变万化。

sentences.english: But 2000 people at a time and there're old wishes here .
sentences.chinese: 世事千变万化，然这艘船每次只载2000人。

sentences.english: We're more like blocks, but the myriads of changes cannot withstand a single blow.
sentences.chinese: 我们的关系多像积木啊，不堪一击却又千变万化。

sentences.english: The clinical manifestations are protean with multisystem involvement.
sentences.chinese: 多系统受累的临床表现是千变万化的。

definition: many superficial changes but no departure from the original stand (idiom); plus ça change, plus ça reste la mème chose
pinyin: wan4 bian4 bu4 li2 qi2 zong1

definition: in an instant a myriad changes (idiom); rapid substantial change
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut
to transform/to convert/to vary/to alternate/a transformation
